##Loads in data

```{r load data}
data<- read.delim(unz("cpc_current.tsv.zip", "cpc_current.tsv"), header=TRUE, sep ="\t", comment.char="#",  stringsAsFactors = FALSE, quote="\"", fill = FALSE)
```

## displays summary of data

```{r view data}
head(data)
nrow(data)
ncol(data)
str(data)
summary(data)


```
